page.title: 07Accident Blackspot
page.content: Residents are very concerned about the number of accidents which have occurred at the junction of two busy roads in the village and have called in{traffic}experts to 'slow-down' vehicles and study traffic flow. Options are the installation of traffic lights or a roundabout.Costing has already started for the latter to see if it is affordable and police are looking closely at an idea to put up {speed}warning signs. Matters were brought to a head recently with a horrific{crash}which resulted in the deaths of two young men. Local councillors,safety experts and police are due to meet shortly to discuss the problem in depth.
